exposuremodes: Auto modes (auto; auto [flash off]), scene modes (portrait; landscape;  child;  sports; close up;  night portrait;  night landscape;  party/indoor;  beach/snow;  sunset; dusk/dawn;  pet portrait;  candlelight;  blossom;  autumn colors;  food), special effects modes (night vision;  colour sketch;  miniature effect;  selective colour; silhouette;  high key;  low key), programmed auto with flexible program(P), shutter-priority auto (S), aperture-priority auto (A), manual (M), U1(user settings 1), U2(user settings 2)
whitebalance: Auto (2 types), incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual (up to 6 values can be stored, spot white balance measurement available during live view), choose color temperature (2500 K to 10000 K), all with fine-tuning
